import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import* as books from '../assets/books.json'; import { BooksService } from './books/services/books.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit{ title = 'MyBookStore'; author: any; ngOnInit() { } }
